name: Slime N' Find
description:
Clean the dungeon to appease your Big Flame Elemental GF

WASD - Move
Mouse - Camera
E - Talk
J - Jiggle


=============

Created for Global Game Jam Vancouver 2021
https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/slime-n-find-4
